Your induction

Your library

The legal support through Cooley was very helpful. I was able to get the terms and conditions, payment policy and subscription policy document completed and placed in the right parts of my website. It really took the stress out of figuring out how to do it on my own.

Working with this team of professionals has been a genuine 'weight lifted off shoulders' experience. Like a child learning to ride a bike, the team have been my 'stabilsers' for the last few weeks - I'm mentally preparing myself to release them and tentatively look back at my first business venture parents!

Lucille Onyema

Drama in Mind

Business 4

Introduction to Business 4

Online | 60 minutes

Attendees

grantee

Fund

Ecwiti

Countries

Wales

The evening with PA consulting was so incredibly helpful. In a room, with a flip chart and some extra brains, the consultants helped me take the language I had used in funding applications and work through it to bring about a more simple clarity and value in every sentence. This had immediate impact in enabling me to better articulate our work within the community and lead to securing funding from The lottery and local community funders.

Emma Baines

Find Your Voice
